Hi Joel,

Thanks for sharing this great list. I don't have access to the gu=
ided

hors
and the titles that it might have something to do with what we are tal=
king
about (e.g., there is a chapter on empowerment).

Note that there are =
older references about the predictive information idea
in the playful machi=
nes book.

Indeed, nature seems to be explorative and curious. I noticed th=
ough that
children often watch the same cartoon over and over again instead=
 of always
being curious about new cartoons. Perhaps each time they watch i=
t they
learn something else or perhaps they have an intrinsic reward for co=
rrectly
anticipating what will happen next?

Best,
Vassilis
